statements: SELECT * FROM quality_analysis;
SELECT issue_description, production_data FROM quality_analysis;
SELECT issue_id, issue_description FROM quality_analysis WHERE issue_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM quality_analysis WHERE issue_id = 3;
SELECT issue_description, production_data FROM quality_analysis WHERE issue_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM quality_analysis WHERE issue_id = 100;
SELECT issue_description, production_data FROM quality_analysis WHERE issue_id > 50 ORDER BY issue_id DESC;
SELECT issue_id, issue_description FROM quality_analysis WHERE production_data LIKE '%error%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM quality_analysis WHERE issue_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9) OR production_data IS NULL;
SELECT issue_id, COUNT(issue_id) AS total_issues FROM quality_analysis GROUP BY issue_id ORDER BY total_issues DESC;
SELECT * FROM quality_issues;
SELECT issue_name, issue_description FROM quality_issues WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM production_data WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT department, COUNT(entry_id) AS total_entries FROM production_data GROUP BY department;
SELECT issue_name, timestamp FROM quality_issues ORDER BY timestamp ASC, issue_name DESC;
SELECT issue_name, issue_description FROM quality_issues WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM production_data WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY production_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT SUM(quantity) as total_quantity FROM production_data GROUP BY department HAVING total_quantity > 1000
SELECT issue_name, COUNT(*) as total_issues FROM quality_issues GROUP BY issue_name ORDER BY total_issues DESC
SELECT issue_name, issue_description, department FROM quality_issues INNER JOIN production_data ON quality_issues.id = production_data.issue_id
SELECT * FROM quality_issues;
SELECT issue_description, issue_date FROM quality_issues WHERE id = '7c5cde99-98c3-4ad0-9495-dc097cf88c22';
SELECT data_id, data_value FROM production_data ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT cause_description FROM root_causes WHERE issue_id = '10c0598d-3acb-4ef1-9f52-bd0b25938445';
SELECT data_value, data_type FROM production_data WHERE data_type = 'sensor' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM quality_issues ORDER BY issue_date DESC, issue_description ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT cause_description, issue_description FROM root_causes INNER JOIN quality_issues ON root_causes.issue_id = quality_issues.id WHERE root_causes.cause_id > 5
SELECT * FROM production_data WHERE DATA_TYPE = 'TypeA' AND data_value LIKE '%example%'
SELECT issue_description, issue_date FROM quality_issues WHERE issue_date > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 week'
SELECT cause_description, COUNT(*) FROM root_causes GROUP BY cause_description ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
SELECT id, issue_description, production_data FROM QualityIssues WHERE id = 1
SELECT cause_description, issue_id FROM RootCauses WHERE issue_id = 2
SELECT date, product_id FROM ProductionData WHERE id = 3
SELECT id, issue_description FROM QualityIssues WHERE id > 2
SELECT * FROM SQLQueries
SELECT * FROM QualityIssues WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM RootCauses WHERE cause_description LIKE '%system%';
SELECT * FROM ProductionData ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, issue_id FROM ProductionData WHERE product_id = 1000;
SELECT * FROM SQLQueries WHERE result IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, description, created_at FROM Issue;
SELECT id, analysis FROM RootCause WHERE issue_id = 123;
SELECT issue_id, value, timestamp FROM ProductionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, passed FROM QualityCheck WHERE passed = true;
SELECT query, result FROM QueryAnalysis WHERE issue_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM Issue;
SELECT id, description FROM Issue ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM QualityCheck WHERE passed = true;
SELECT Issue.id, Issue.description, QualityCheck.passed FROM Issue JOIN QualityCheck ON Issue.id = QualityCheck.issue_id;
SELECT Issue.id, ProductionData.value, QueryAnalysis.result FROM Issue LEFT JOIN ProductionData ON Issue.id = ProductionData.issue_id LEFT JOIN QueryAnalysis ON Issue.id = QueryAnalysis.issue_id;
